game.name: Halloween Scary Jungle Road Drive
game.description:
The wonderful Halloween night is just around the corner, and you want something haunting and scary to try! What do not you try out this latest adventure challenge to allow yourself to be surrounded by the spirit of your favourite festival? It will be surprising to meet here with a curious boy naming Jamie in Halloween Scary Jungle Road Drive. Your job is to guide him through the jungle without catching by the ghosts in multiple levels. Do not leave him alone as he trusts you a lot.

His friend Aron has advised him not to go to the jungle. However, the curiosity of Jamie has lead him this place. He reached here with his best friend named Alan who has already lost in the jungle. Now it is up to you how to assist the boy to pass this dangerous jungle and spot his best friend in this HTML5 escaping game. Get ready to drive in a village at nights where a great number of ghosts reside!

Use your brain active all the time and make sure not to overpass the current area without being caught by a group of deadly ghosts in this scary game! Each finish line includes some spooky souls who will kill you immediately if you hit! Do not forget to turn off the head light when a kind of warning light shown on the screen. Try to wait there until the warning appears on the screen to move on! Good luck to guide Jamie to survive through 10 different addictive challenges!
